verses.verse: {To the Director: With stringed instruments. A Davidic instruction, {54:T Lit. maskil} when the Ziphites came and told Saul, "David is hiding among us, is he not?"} {A Prayer in Times of Trouble} d God, by your name deliver me, and by your power vindicate me.
God, listen to my prayer, and pay attention to the words of my mouth.
For the arrogant have arisen against me; oppressors have sought to take my life. They do not keep God in mind! {Lit. before them} Interlude
Look, God is my helper; the Lord is with those who are guarding my life.
He will turn the evil upon those who lie in wait for me. Cut them off with your truth.
With a free will offering I will sacrifice to you; I will give thanks to your name, Lord , because it is good,
for he has delivered me from every trouble, and my eyes have seen the end of {The Heb. lacks the end of} my enemies.
